verses.text: Yo, this is James’ bro, writing to the OG lady and her squad—big love from me, and from the whole crew that’s keeping it real in the truth.
Mad respect, ‘cause you’ve been walking straight in God’s truth—real talk, that’s what we’re here for.
Big vibes of grace, mercy, and peace from God the Father and Jesus our Lord, who is fully real and true, coming at you straight.
Lowkey, I was hyped to find out some of your squad is living by the truth—staying loyal to Jesus, no cap.
Now, I’m asking for one thing: keep showing love in real ways. Don’t just talk it, live it.
Love isn’t random—it’s following God’s commands. That’s how we keep walking in the truth.
Watch out for imposters—people sneaking in teaching stuff that denies Jesus came in the flesh. That’s shady.
Stay alert! Don’t lose the reward you’ve been working for—keep your eyes on the prize, fully locked in.
Anyone rolling with false teachings? Don’t even vibe with them in a way that gives approval—don’t welcome them into your squad.
If you do welcome them, you’re basically joining their shady moves. Big no-no.
Anyone who gives props to their sketchy actions shares in the consequences. Keep your energy clean.
I’m not gonna spam you with a long letter—hope to see you IRL soon and we can talk face-to-face.
Peace out from the squad here—our friends send mad love.
